Bio

I am a first-year Ph.D. student in the UNITES Lab at University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, where I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. Tianlong Chen. Prior to UNC, I obtained an M.S. in ISysE at KAIST, advised by Prof. Chanyoung Park. During my Master's, I was honored with the Best Paper Award at the ICML WCB 2023 and spent wonderful time in Tokyo as a visiting researcher at Tokyo Tech, working with Prof. Tsuyoshi Murata and, Dr. Xin Liu.

My current research intersts ile in AI4Science and Multi-Agent LLMs. Specifically, I am interested in (A) addressing the inductive bias-key to the success-of LLMs, GNNs, and MoE with their (B) application in the field of Computational Biology. Additionally, I have recently been focusing on (C) communication strategies among Multi-Agent LLMs to achieve collaborative synergy.

News

  • 2023-Past
  • Oct., 2024     Two preprints released; Check out AgentPrune (Multi-agent Communication Pruning), and PortLLM (Training-free Personalized LLM).
  • Sep., 2024     A paper got accepted at NeurIPS 2024 as Spotlight Presentation - Flexible Modality Learning.
  • Sep., 2024     A paper got accepted at EMNLP 2024 Findings - LLM + KG for AD.
  • Aug., 2024     Our paper, “Subgraph Federated Learning for Local Generalization” won the Best Paper Award at KDD 2024 workshop on Federated Learning for Data Mining and Graph Analytics!
  • Jul., 2024     A paper got accepted at KDD 2024 workshop on Federated Learning for Data Mining and Graph Analytics.
  • Jul., 2024     A paper got accepted at ECCV 2024 - Multiplexed Immunofluorescence Image Analysis.
  • Apr., 2024     A paper got accepted at Briefings in Bioinformatics 2024 - Single-cell Imputation + FP.
  • Apr., 2024     A paper got accepted at WWW 2024 Workshop on Data-centric Artificial Intelligence (DCAI).
  • Mar., 2024     I will be joining UNITES Lab@UNC Chapel Hill this Fall as a Ph.D. Student!
  • Jan., 2024     A paper got accepted at PAKDD 2024 - Feature + Structure Noise in Graph.
  • Oct., 2023     I served as a session chair in the Knowledge Representation 3 session at CIKM 2023.
  • Aug., 2023     Two papers got accepted at CIKM 2023.
  • Jul., 2023     Our paper, “Single-cell RNA-seq data imputation using Feature Propagation” won the Best Paper Award at ICML 2023 Workshop on Computational Biology!
  • Jun., 2023     A paper got accepted for a contributed talk at ICML 2023 Workshop on Computational Biology. Excited to give a talk at Honolulu, Hawai’i!
  • Apr., 2023     A paper got accepted at SIGIR 2023.
  • Aug., 2022     A paper got accepted at CIKM 2022.
  • Jul., 2022     I will be joining Tokyo Tech this Fall-Winter as a visting researcher under supervision of Prof. Tsuyoshi Murata. Looking forward to it!
  • Aug., 2021     I joined DSAIL@KAIST as a Master Student!
